item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, join us for an interesting evening as we sit around the fireplace discussing "hot" topics while drinking hot choclate and eating some finger food!

Will be running the "Discussion Night" two times a month on a "Thursday "  night.

Each night will be talking about a "single" concern or topic that interests everyone.  There may be nights when only guys might want to attend or a "girls night event"

We will be starting out with "Powerful Online Dating Profiles to attract Women / Men”

 We will discuss how to write and attractive, interesting, compelling profile to stand out from the rest online and to inrease the likelihood of meeting a special person. Examples will be handed out and if you have an especially good profile that you like bring it in and we will discuss it! Some other topics which will be discussed:

Top three mistakes women make when posting photos on online dating websites…

The Best Female Online Dating Profile

Online Dating – Tips and Advice for Men

 

If anyone has any suggestions or has any questions don't hesitate to contact me at: 603-3123-6735.

If you have any food that you would like to bring that would be geat, if not don't worry about I have plenty!

See you there!

Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Discussion Night "
